books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The line between fact and fiction becomes blurred when an author of thrillers is found dead after a hurricane hits Camino Island.
books.name: CAMINO WINDS

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Four novellas: “Mr. Harrigan’s Phone,” “The Life of Chuck,” “Rat” and “If It Bleeds.”
books.name: IF IT BLEEDS

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The sixth book in the Memory Man series. Decker and Jamison investigate a murder in a North Dakota town in a fracking boom.
books.name: WALK THE WIRE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The triumphs and losses of one family over the last century are recounted as a symbolic piece of apparel gets handed down through the generations.
books.name: THE WEDDING DRESS

books.author: by Sally Rooney
books.description: The connection between a high school star athlete and a loner ebbs and flows when they go to Trinity College in Dublin.
books.name: NORMAL PEOPLE

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: A scholarly young woman named Ana meets an 18-year-old Jesus and becomes caught up in a confluence of dangers.
books.name: THE BOOK OF LONGINGS

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 30th book in the Prey series. Washington politicians ask Lucas Davenport to look into someone who is targeting their children.
books.name: MASKED PREY

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Lawrence Wright
books.description: Henry Parsons, a microbiologist and epidemiologist, goes to Indonesia to check out a deadly virus that soon will affect the entire planet.
books.name: THE END OF OCTOBER

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher gets caught up in a turf war between Ukrainian and Albanian gangs.
books.name: BLUE MOON

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.
books.name: THE GIVER OF STARS
